input.sentences: a group of friends got together for a bbq .
[male] was there and he looked very tired .
[male] however was the master on the grill and was grilling up some fine food .
[male] still looked very tired so he went over had a seat .
marks food was looking really good he had master bbq skills .
output.sentences: The lady in the ever present white hat, smiled as she joined her friends for a a barbecue.
The head chef for the day closed his eyes, looking very tired and hot from standing over the pit.
His brother wasn't a chef but a master at grilling chicken just the way everyone liked it.
The head chef opened his eyes, spotted his brother doing such a great job, found a seat and took a load off.
When everyone sat down to eat they raved, giving high marks to the tired chef and the chicken master.
